title: Closing the pool for maintanencres
detailse: Unfortunately, the fun in the sun has to stop sometimes. Pool need to be closed for maintenance, cleaning and because it is the end of the season.

title: New closures in the gym
detailse: As COVID-19 cases the governors imposed restrictions on health clubs and gyms.

title: Payment for the house community
detailse: We understand you may be finding it difficult to pay your payment for the house community at this time and we want to help. You may have lost your job as a result of the coronavirus, be self-employed or have other changes of circumstances which mean you have less money coming in. Please call us on 052-1231212 for help with paying for the house community

title: Closing the pool for maintanencre3
detailse: Some quick example text to build on the message title and make up the bulk of the message's content.
